name: ALLSALE Corp.
description: AI-driven influencer marketing platform purpose-built for beauty brands leveraging the explosive growth of TikTok Shop in the U.S. The company addresses the increasing demand for automated, data-driven influencer campaigns that prioritize measurable ROI.
